questions.ask: How do I boil an egg?
questions.author: eggluv202
questions.notes: I have three eggs that I want to boil. Preferably hard boil. My dream is to make a chef's salad because that will mean I am a chef. Please help me achieve my dream!

questions.author: fashnweathr88
questions.notes: When is it acceptable to wear a sweater? I feel like I just keep missing sweater weather.

questions.ask: How many pineapples should I eat in one sitting?
questions.author: citrusfruit4lyfe
questions.notes: I love to eat pineapple but I'm worried I might be eating too much of it. How much is acceptable? Can I eat nine during a 30 minute episode of my favorite sitcom? Will this ruin my insides???
